TypeSignature.Value: public delegate void OdbcRowUpdatingEventHandler(object sender, OdbcRowUpdatingEventArgs e);
.class public auto ansi sealed OdbcRowUpdatingEventHandler extends System.MulticastDelegate
Public Delegate Sub OdbcRowUpdatingEventHandler(sender As Object, e As OdbcRowUpdatingEventArgs)
public delegate void OdbcRowUpdatingEventHandler(System::Object ^ sender, OdbcRowUpdatingEventArgs ^ e);
type OdbcRowUpdatingEventHandler = delegate of obj * OdbcRowUpdatingEventArgs -> unit

span.span: The that contains the event data.

summary.span: 表示将要处理 的 事件的方法。

span.span: Represents the method that will handle the event of an .

remarks.format: ## Remarks 处理程序不需要执行任何操作，你的代码应避免生成异常或允许异常传播到调用方法。The handler is not required to perform any action, and your code should avoid generating exceptions or allowing exceptions to propagate to the calling method. 任何访问调用方的异常都将被忽略。Any exceptions that do reach the caller are ignored. 使用处理程序来处理 并指定处理更新的方式。Use the handler to process and to specify how updates are processed. 例如，您可以选择跳过对当前行的更新，或跳过所有剩余行的更新。For example, you may opt to skip the update of the current row or skip the update of all remaining rows. 请注意，行将按从数据源接收行的顺序进行更新。Note that the rows are updated in the order that they were received from the data source. 创建 委托时，需要标识将要处理该事件的方法。When you create an delegate, you identify the method that will handle the event. 若要将事件与事件处理程序关联，请将该委托的一个实例添加到事件中。To associate the event with your event handler, add an instance of the delegate to the event. 除非移除了该委托，否则每当发生该事件时就会调用事件处理程序。The event handler is called whenever the event occurs, unless you remove the delegate. 有关事件处理程序委托的详细信息，请参阅[处理和引发事件](~/docs/standard/events/index.md)For more information about event handler delegates, see [Handling and Raising Events](~/docs/standard/events/index.md)
